thread.section_title: ArcataPet.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ArcataPet.com | www.arcatapet.com
thread.title: Kristen Plescow

author: Kristen Plescow
title: Kristen Plescow
text:
I was trawling the internet for a few days for Jungle Dawn LEDs, and I came across ArcataPet's store. A few weeks ago I ordered one just to "test the water"... it came within a few days of ordering it, which really surprised me. I loved the light, and soon after I put in an order for another two that came just as quickly.
I was chuffed at the quick service, which is why I became a repeat customer. Keep up the great work!
